players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "I find it strange that we've already had a death in our midst so early in the game. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure we can identify and eliminate any potential threats."

Diana: "I agree with Charlie. Let's focus on building trust and communication within our group to help us make informed decisions. We should also keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any hasty judgments."

You: "I think we should all try to remain calm and focused during this investigation. Let's give the detective enough time to gather information before jumping to conclusions or making any rash decisions."

Diana: "Let's continue to work together and trust each other as we uncover the truth behind Bob's death. It's important that we remain open-minded and communicate effectively to ensure we make informed decisions."
Charlie: remained silent.

You: "I believe we should all keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before jumping to conclusions. Let's continue to work together and trust each other as we uncover the truth behind Bob's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "I find it strange that we've already had a death in our midst so early in the game. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure we can identify and eliminate any potential threats."

You: "I agree with Charlie. Let's focus on building trust and communication within our group to help us make informed decisions. We should also keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any hasty judgments."
